clients.name: Zorak Quasor

scars: Small scar on left cheek
tattoos: None

clients.description: Zorak is a quiet and reserved individual, originally from Valhalla Crater, who has experienced significant challenges transitioning to life on Earth. He is known for his resourcefulness and practical skills, having been raised in a nomadic clan that values independence. Zorak has shown resilience in adjusting to new circumstances but remains wary of formal institutions. He enjoys spending time alone in nature and has expressed interest in counseling services to help with adapting to societal norms and managing past traumatic experiences from a harsh upbringing. Initial caseworker noted Zorak has a warm sense of humor once comfortable.

clients.name: Lyra Valkron

scars: Small scar on left eyebrow
tattoos: Tribal symbol on right shoulder

clients.description: Lyra is a strong-willed individual who grew up in the frigid regions of Ice Canyon Outpost. She is well-known for her determination and resilience, often leading community initiatives in her hometown. Lyra's upbringing instilled a deep respect for her heritage and community, values she brings to her work. Although her outward demeanor can be guarded, she is compassionate and fiercely protective of those she cares about. She enjoys engaging in creative activities, such as crafting traditional Andorian garments, and has sought support for anxiety related to leaving her community. Her caseworker describes her as a natural leader with a nurturing spirit.

clients.name: Thragg Threx

scars: Deep scar across right bicep
tattoos: Family crest on upper back

clients.description: Thragg is a commanding figure who grew up under the strict codes of Kryptonian society in Kandor City. He has a reputation for his imposing presence and natural leadership abilities, which have been both an asset and a point of tension throughout his life. Thragg has spent most of his life in service to the High Council, and his upbringing has shaped him into a disciplined and highly strategic individual. Despite his stoic exterior, Thragg has a deep-seated desire to protect those who cannot defend themselves, a value instilled by his family's creed. His caseworker described him as fiercely loyal, but also noted the need for support in developing personal relationships outside of duty and obligation.

clients.name: N'Tal G'Kor

scars: Faint scar on left palm
tattoos: Vulcan family symbol on left shoulder blade

clients.description: N'Tal G'Kor is a highly logical and composed individual, as expected of his Vulcan heritage. Born and raised in the city of Shi'Kahr, he has always upheld the Vulcan principles of logic and emotional suppression, which has contributed to his calm demeanor. N'Tal is an only child who was raised to prioritize scholarly pursuits, particularly in the fields of astronomy and philosophy. He has an intense curiosity about the universe, balanced by his disciplined lifestyle. N'Tal prefers solitude but has shown a willingness to engage with those seeking knowledge, making him a patient mentor. His caseworker has noted that while he remains emotionally distant, his sense of duty to others is deeply ingrained.

clients.name: Rylah Al'Sune

scars: Small scar on right knee
tattoos: Symbol of Nova Corps on her right forearm

clients.description: Rylah Al'Sune grew up in the bustling colony of Nova Prime on Xandar. As the youngest of three siblings, she learned to be both adaptable and fiercely independent. Rylah's upbringing instilled in her a strong sense of justice, and she eventually joined the Nova Corps, where she serves with dedication and pride. She is known for her analytical mind and quick thinking in high-pressure situations. Rylah has a natural charisma, making her a trusted confidant among her peers, though she sometimes struggles with delegating responsibilities, preferring to take on challenges alone. Her caseworker noted her resilience and her strong desire to make a meaningful impact, though she may benefit from support in balancing her personal and professional life.

clients.name: Gornak Dar

scars: Jagged scar across left cheek
tattoos: House of Dar crest on chest

clients.description: Gornak Dar is a proud member of the Klingon Warrior Caste, born in the First City of Qo'noS. Known for his unyielding commitment to honor and tradition, Gornak has spent most of his life training and fighting to uphold his family's reputation within the Empire. He is a fierce combatant, both respected and feared for his martial skills, and he has participated in numerous campaigns to defend Klingon territories. Despite his gruff demeanor, Gornak values camaraderie and respects those who demonstrate courage and integrity. He is loyal to his House and is deeply motivated by a desire to prove his worth. His caseworker has noted that Gornak could benefit from assistance in processing unresolved trauma from his time in battle, as he often struggles to express vulnerability even among allies.

clients.name: T'Lor Kryl

scars: Small scar on left lekku
birthmarks: Red pigment birthmark at base of lekku
tattoos: Twilek tribal patterns on lekku tips

clients.description: T'Lor Kryl hails from Kala'uun, the bustling trade hub on Ryloth. She is a Lethan Twilek, known for her distinct red skin, which marks her as rare among her people. T'Lor was the first-born child in her family and quickly took on a caretaker role for her siblings. She has a natural affinity for negotiation and often served as a mediator in local disputes. Her experiences growing up amidst the harsh climates of Ryloth have made her adaptable and quick-witted. T'Lor enjoys dance as a form of expression, and she has faced challenges balancing her cultural expectations with her own ambitions to become a respected trader. Her caseworker noted her potential to excel in diplomacy but also recognized that she could benefit from guidance in managing the stress that accompanies her aspirations.

clients.name: Xarvis Tark

scars: None
tattoos: Family sigil on left forearm

clients.description: Xarvis Tark was born in Rixx, the cultural capital of Betazed. He is a telepath, like most Betazoids, and has always been highly attuned to the emotions of those around him. This natural sensitivity has made him both a gifted counselor and occasionally overwhelmed by the intensity of others' feelings. Xarvis is the middle child of five siblings, which has often led him to play the role of mediator and peacekeeper within his family. He has pursued a career in mental health, focusing on empathic therapy, where his telepathic skills are particularly useful. Xarvis is deeply empathetic, though he sometimes finds it challenging to shield himself from emotional overload. His caseworker described him as exceptionally compassionate but noted that developing stronger personal boundaries would help him maintain his well-being while serving others.

clients.name: Korvak Sharr

scars: Diagonal scar across chest from old combat wound
birthmarks: Dark speckled mark on right thigh
tattoos: Tribal war crest across back

clients.description: Korvak Sharr was born in the Vorta Wastes on Zarn, a harsh and unforgiving environment that shaped his formidable character. Growing up as the youngest of four siblings in a warrior family, Korvak learned to survive and thrive through strength and resilience. He has spent much of his life as a defender of the Zarnian Tribal Confederation, participating in numerous territorial conflicts. Known for his imposing stature and tactical mind, Korvak is a respected leader among his people. Despite his stern and often intimidating demeanor, those close to him know him to be fiercely protective of his family and tribe. His caseworker has noted that Korvak struggles with adapting to peaceful civilian life and may benefit from therapeutic programs focusing on emotional expression and stress management.

clients.name: Lanya Korr

scars: Thin scar on right forearm from a training incident
tattoos: Thanagarian wings symbol on lower back

clients.description: Lanya Korr was born in the city of Thanaldor, one of the major cultural centers of Thanagar. As an only child, Lanya's early life was focused on rigorous training in aerial combat and cultural history, reflecting her people's proud warrior traditions. She is of the Skyborn ethnicity, noted for their adept flying skills, which she demonstrates in her precision and agility during training. Lanya has a curious and adventurous nature, always eager to explore new territories. Though she embraces her heritage, she is also interested in understanding other cultures, often expressing a desire to visit other worlds. Her caseworker has noted that Lanya could benefit from more interpersonal connections outside her training, as her focused upbringing has left her with limited experience in casual social situations.

clients.name: Ronan Xar

scars: Two small scars on left hand from combat training
tattoos: Nova Corps emblem on upper left arm

clients.description: Ronan Xar was born and raised in the Nova Prime District on Xandar, where he grew up in the shadow of the Nova Corps headquarters. From an early age, he aspired to join the Corps, idolizing the defenders of Xandar. As the third-born of five siblings, Ronan often found himself mediating conflicts between his brothers and sisters, which helped hone his skills in communication and diplomacy. He eventually joined the Nova Corps, serving as a field operative. Ronan is known for his tactical acumen and cool-headed nature under pressure, though his commitment to duty sometimes leads him to neglect his personal life. His caseworker noted that Ronan could benefit from more work-life balance and from fostering relationships outside his Corps responsibilities to avoid burnout.

clients.name: J'Kar Xy

scars: Diagonal scar on upper back from a ritual combat
birthmarks: Faint crescent mark on left shoulder
tattoos: Minbari sacred emblem on chest

clients.description: J'Kar Xy was born in Yedor, a prominent city on Minbar, and was raised within the Religious Caste of his people. As the first-born, J'Kar was often expected to uphold the traditions and spiritual practices of his family. He dedicated much of his early life to study, learning the ancient teachings and meditative arts that define Minbari culture. Over the years, he took on a role as a spiritual advisor, guiding younger generations through their initiations and struggles. J'Kar is a calm and reflective individual, deeply committed to his beliefs, and respected for his wisdom. However, his caseworker noted that his intense devotion to tradition sometimes hinders his ability to adapt to new ideas and that exposure to diverse cultural experiences might help broaden his perspective.

clients.name: Soran Jax

scars: Thin scar above right eyebrow
birthmarks: Oval birthmark on back of neck
tattoos: Romulan Star Empire insignia on left ankle

clients.description: Soran Jax was born in Ki Baratan, the bustling capital of Romulus. As the second-born child, Soran often found herself striving to prove her worth in a highly competitive family environment. She was trained in tactical studies and espionage, skills that are highly valued within the Romulan Star Empire. Soran is a fiercely independent and determined individual who excels in strategic thinking. Her sharp wit and resourcefulness have made her a valuable asset in the Romulan military, where she currently serves as an intelligence officer. Though Soran maintains a composed and confident exterior, she has difficulty trusting others, a trait that has often isolated her from those around her. Her caseworker noted that while her dedication is commendable, she could benefit from opening up emotionally to foster deeper interpersonal relationships.

clients.name: Tirrak Zor

scars: Long scar down left thigh from a hunting incident
birthmarks: Large irregular birthmark on left calf
tattoos: Daxamite honor bands on both wrists

clients.description: Tirrak Zor was born in the Tarin Fields, a fertile region on Daxam known for its sprawling plains. As the eldest child in a family of farmers, Tirrak quickly learned the value of hard work and community. His imposing stature made him a natural leader, and he often took on responsibilities that went beyond his age. Tirrak later joined the Daxam Confederation military, where he served as a captain, leading his troops with a blend of discipline and compassion. Known for his physical prowess, Tirrak has a deep sense of loyalty to his people. However, his susceptibility to lead—a well-known vulnerability among Daxamites—has always been a concern, restricting his activities off-world. His caseworker noted that while Tirrak is reliable and strong, he often avoids expressing his own vulnerabilities, and could benefit from programs that help him adapt to environments outside of his comfort zone.

clients.name: Naomi S'Vak

scars: Small scar on left wrist from a childhood accident
tattoos: Ornamental Trill spots extending down her neck and sides, traditional markings

clients.description: Naomi S'Vak was born in Loval City, a hub of culture and learning on Trill. Raised as an only child, she grew up with a fascination for the intricate connection between her people and their symbionts, although she herself remains unjoined. Naomi has always been deeply inquisitive and passionate about her studies, often immersing herself in biology and xenobiology, aspiring to one day work for the Trill Symbiosis Commission. Her independent spirit and drive to uncover the unknown make her a brilliant researcher. However, her caseworker has noted that Naomi's single-minded focus sometimes isolates her from others, and she would benefit from engaging more in community and social activities to build stronger personal connections.

clients.name: Xylor Zythar

scars: Diagonal scar across abdomen from a training duel
birthmarks: Spiral-shaped mark on right shoulder blade
tattoos: Tamaranean royal symbol on left calf

clients.description: Xylor Zythar was born in Astra City on Tamaran, known for its thriving warrior culture and rich heritage. Growing up as part of the Astra Nomadic Clan, Xylor learned to adapt quickly and developed a passion for combat and adventure. He is highly athletic, possessing the unique Tamaranean ability to convert solar energy into strength, a skill that serves him well in both battle and daily life. As the middle child of his family, Xylor often found himself balancing the roles of peacemaker and independent warrior. He is known for his infectious optimism and intense loyalty to his clan, though he can sometimes struggle with impulsiveness. His caseworker noted that while Xylor’s enthusiasm and dedication are admirable, learning to channel his energy more constructively could help him build deeper, more consistent relationships.

clients.name: Velora Zyn

scars: Small scar on chin from a childhood fall
birthmarks: Light swirl-shaped mark on lower back
tattoos: Rigellian Artisan emblem on right forearm

clients.description: Velora Zyn was born in the Crystal District of Rigel V, an area renowned for its artisans and craftsmen. Growing up as the youngest in a family deeply involved in the Crystal Artisan Guild, Velora developed a love for intricate design and sculpture, skills that set her apart within the guild. She is known for her precision and creativity, often blending traditional Rigellian techniques with innovative designs. Velora is also an empath, sensitive to the emotional states of those around her, which makes her both a compassionate friend and an insightful artist. Her empathetic nature, however, sometimes leaves her overwhelmed by the intensity of others' emotions. Her caseworker noted that Velora would benefit from learning coping strategies for emotional regulation, allowing her to maintain her artistic flow without becoming emotionally drained.

clients.name: Brax Thron

scars: Large scar across chest from cybernetic implantation surgery
tattoos: Circuitry pattern tattoo along left arm, symbolizing the unity of machine and organic life

clients.description: Brax Thron was born in Megacity Alpha on Earth, one of the sprawling hubs of technological advancement. From a young age, Brax was fascinated by technology, and after sustaining serious injuries in a mining accident, he chose to undergo extensive cybernetic augmentation, turning him into a powerful human-cyborg hybrid. Standing at an imposing 6'7", Brax is equipped with enhanced strength, endurance, and sensory capabilities, which have made him an invaluable member of Megacity's defense force. While Brax is highly disciplined and a dedicated protector of his community, his reliance on cybernetics has sometimes made him question his humanity. His caseworker noted that Brax would benefit from therapeutic sessions focused on reconnecting with his organic self, helping him find balance between his human emotions and his machine enhancements.

clients.name: Kira Voss

scars: Scar on right forearm from a mechanical accident
birthmarks: Small star-shaped birthmark on her left hip
tattoos: Constellation tattoo on her upper back, symbolizing her love for the stars

clients.description: Kira Voss was born in the New Europa Colony on the Lunar Base, a part of the United Terran Alliance's efforts to expand human habitation beyond Earth. As a first-born child, Kira was taught early on to be self-reliant and resourceful, traits that helped her navigate life on the moon. Her fascination with mechanics and engineering began in childhood, and she later pursued a career as a technician for the Lunar Colony's life-support systems. Kira is known for her quick thinking and ability to solve problems under pressure, traits that make her an essential member of the colony's maintenance crew. Though she enjoys her independence, her caseworker has noted that Kira sometimes isolates herself from others, preferring to work alone. Encouraging her to take part in more social activities could help her build stronger community ties.

clients.name: Oron Zynik

scars: Scar across left cheek from battle training
tattoos: Skrullian war insignia on right shoulder

clients.description: Oron Zynik was born in the Central Hive on Skrullos Prime, the heart of the Skrull Empire. As one of a set of quadruplets, Oron learned the value of unity and adaptation from a young age, traits that are highly regarded in Skrull culture. Skrulls are known for their shapeshifting abilities, and Oron has specialized in espionage, using his skills to infiltrate and gather intelligence for the Skrull Empire. His cunning and adaptability have made him an asset to his people, though the nature of his work has left him wary of trusting others, even within his own ranks. Oron is resilient and resourceful, often relying on his instinct for survival. His caseworker has suggested that Oron might benefit from building interpersonal trust through structured group activities, as his distrust has isolated him socially despite his loyalty to his people.

clients.name: Iona Rel

scars: Three claw-like scars across her left shoulder from combat
tattoos: Kree Empire insignia on her upper right arm

clients.description: Iona Rel was born in Kree-Lar, the capital city of Hala, and was raised in the heart of the Kree Empire's military culture. As an only child, she was expected to carry the legacy of her family, which had a long history of military service. Iona's upbringing was steeped in discipline, and she quickly rose through the ranks of the Kree military, earning recognition for her strategic prowess and dedication. Known for her pale blue skin and intense presence, she is fiercely loyal to the Kree Empire, but her unwavering commitment has at times made her rigid and uncompromising. Iona has a strong sense of duty and pride, yet her caseworker has noted that her emotional reserve often creates distance between her and her peers. Engaging in activities outside her military role could help her build more personal connections and foster empathy.

clients.name: Torrk Kallar

scars: Long scar along the right ribcage from a training accident
birthmarks: Faint crescent-shaped birthmark on his left shoulder
tattoos: Daxamite honor crest on his upper back, symbolizing strength and loyalty

clients.description: Torrk Kallar hails from the Valdan Highlands of Daxam, a region known for its harsh terrain and resilient people. As the youngest of three siblings, Torrk often found himself striving to keep up with his older brothers, a drive that pushed him to excel in physical challenges and combat training. He is a skilled warrior and has trained extensively to serve as a protector of his home city. Torrk possesses a strong connection to his heritage and takes pride in his highlander upbringing, embracing the values of resilience and community. Despite his strength and determination, Torrk struggles with Daxamite vulnerabilities, such as lead sensitivity, which limits his capacity to operate in environments outside Daxam. His caseworker has noted that while Torrk is fiercely protective of his family and community, he may benefit from exploring pursuits beyond physical training to help cultivate a more balanced approach to his well-being.

clients.name: Zara Nyx

scars: Thin scar on left cheek from a Terrigenesis ritual
tattoos: Symbol of the Inhuman Collective on her right wrist

clients.description: Zara Nyx was born in Attilan's Blue Sector, a region where many Inhumans undergo their transformation through Terrigenesis. As a Terrigen-Born Inhuman, Zara's transformation at a young age granted her the ability to manipulate shadows, an ability that allows her to blend into her surroundings and move unseen. Growing up as the middle child, Zara often played the role of mediator in her family, which has given her a natural empathy for others and a strong sense of fairness. Zara has embraced her powers but has also struggled with controlling the extent of her abilities, particularly when under stress. Her caseworker noted that Zara could benefit from focused training in power regulation and mindfulness exercises, which would help her manage her emotions and abilities more effectively while deepening her connection with the Inhuman community.

clients.name: Vorrik Mar

scars: Vertical scar across his right eye from combat during the Centauri occupation
tattoos: Narn tribal markings along his back, representing his family lineage

clients.description: Vorrik Mar was born in G'Kar Valley, a region steeped in resistance history during the Centauri occupation of the Narn Homeworld. As the first-born of five siblings, Vorrik took on the responsibility of caring for his family, often acting as both a protector and provider. He grew up during times of conflict, which shaped his strong sense of loyalty and defiance against oppression. Vorrik has served as a commander within the Narn resistance and later in the Narn Regime, where his strength and tactical skills have been highly valued. Known for his stern demeanor and unwavering determination, Vorrik is respected by his peers but can sometimes come across as intimidating. His caseworker has noted that while his dedication to his people is admirable, engaging in activities focused on relaxation and personal expression could help Vorrik find some respite from the pressures of leadership.

clients.name: Rysha Vor

scars: Small scar on her left temple from a childhood accident
tattoos: Orion Syndicate crest on her right shoulder

clients.description: Rysha Vor was born in Syndicate City on Orion Prime, a place renowned for its vibrant trade networks and complex social hierarchy. As a member of the Syndicate Class, Rysha grew up with a deep understanding of the complexities of Orion society, learning the value of influence and negotiation from an early age. She is skilled in persuasion, a talent that she has leveraged to navigate the intricacies of her people's social and political structures. Rysha's emerald green eyes and confident demeanor often make her stand out, and she has earned a reputation for her sharp wit and resourcefulness. Despite her outward confidence, Rysha sometimes struggles with the expectations placed upon her by her community, and her caseworker has noted that engaging in activities unrelated to the Syndicate's demands could help her explore her personal identity outside of her societal role.

clients.name: Xandar Quell

scars: Diagonal scar on right bicep from an emergency field operation
tattoos: Nova Corps emblem on his left forearm, representing his service

clients.description: Xandar Quell was born at Nova Outpost on Xandar, a frontier community known for its ties to the Nova Corps. Raised as an only child, Xandar was exposed early to the militaristic discipline and pride of the Corps, which heavily influenced his path in life. He eventually joined the Nova Corps, rising through the ranks to become a respected field operative. Xandar is well-regarded for his level-headed nature during crises and his ability to inspire calm among his comrades. Despite his dedication to the Corps, he often grapples with the loneliness that comes from being stationed far from home and lacking family ties. His caseworker has suggested that Xandar engage in community-focused activities outside of his official duties to foster a deeper sense of belonging and fulfillment beyond his service role.

clients.name: Korin Jax

scars: Small scar on his right eyebrow from a childhood fall
birthmarks: Faint birthmark on his left forearm in the shape of a crescent
tattoos: Betazoid empathy sigil on his upper back

clients.description: Korin Jax was born in Medara, the capital city of Betazed, and raised within one of the prominent highborn Betazoid families. As the youngest of three siblings, Korin grew up in an environment that encouraged empathy, telepathic training, and a strong sense of social duty. Known for his refined telepathic abilities, Korin serves as an advisor to the Betazed Council, often mediating disputes and aiding in negotiations with his empathic insight. Though his powers have brought him recognition, they also leave him vulnerable to emotional overload, particularly in tense environments. His caseworker has noted that Korin would benefit from practicing more grounding techniques and engaging in activities that help separate his own emotions from those he perceives in others, allowing him to maintain his well-being in high-pressure situations.

clients.name: Elaria D'Var

scars: Thin scar along her right forearm from an industrial accident
tattoos: Cardassian Union insignia on her left shoulder blade

clients.description: Elaria D'Var was born in Lakat City, the bustling center of Cardassia Prime, into a family with a history of civil service. Raised in an environment that valued loyalty to the state above all, Elaria excelled in her studies and quickly secured a role within the Cardassian administrative system. She is known for her methodical approach and analytical mind, which have earned her respect within the Cardassian Union’s Ministry of Information. Elaria is deeply patriotic, though her commitment to the Union sometimes leads her to struggle with the moral complexities of Cardassian policies. Her caseworker noted that while her loyalty is admirable, Elaria could benefit from finding outlets for personal expression and emotional processing, helping her maintain a balance between her duties to the state and her personal identity.

clients.name: Drakon Pyke

scars: Crosshatch scars on exoskeleton from battles over territory
tattoos: Hive crest etched into carapace on chest, symbolizing loyalty to Hive X7

clients.description: Drakon Pyke was born as the leader of the first clutch within Hive X7, located in the remote Outer Reaches. Raised as a Warrior Drone, Drakon has spent his life defending the hive and maintaining order within its complex hierarchy. Known for his powerful exoskeleton and agile combat skills, Drakon has earned respect among his hive-mates and is often relied upon for leading small expeditions and defending key territory. Despite his species' natural aggression, Drakon has a deep sense of loyalty to the collective and a strategic mind that has helped the hive thrive in challenging conditions. His caseworker noted that Drakon's loyalty to the hive is commendable, but exposure to environments beyond the hive might allow him to develop greater independence and strategic thinking beyond immediate survival tactics, potentially aiding in his personal growth.

clients.name: Suri Tal

scars: Small scar behind her left ear from an early childhood accident
tattoos: Vulcan IDIC symbol on her right wrist, symbolizing Infinite Diversity in Infinite Combinations

clients.description: Suri Tal was born in Shi'Kahr, one of Vulcan's oldest and most revered cities, known for its dedication to logic and academic excellence. As the first-born child of her family, Suri was encouraged from a young age to embrace the Vulcan principles of logic, emotional control, and dedication to knowledge. She has since pursued a career in the Vulcan Science Academy, specializing in xenobotany. Suri is known for her methodical research and calm demeanor, traits that have earned her recognition among her peers. However, the pressure to adhere strictly to Vulcan ideals has sometimes made it challenging for her to engage on a personal level with non-Vulcans. Her caseworker noted that exploring artistic or expressive outlets could help Suri connect with others more naturally, enhancing her interpersonal relationships and overall well-being.

clients.name: Garrus Vakarian

scars: Three deep scars across his left mandible from a skirmish during the Reaper conflicts
tattoos: Turian Hierarchy emblem on his left forearm, indicating his military rank and status

clients.description: Garrus Vakarian was born on Palaven, at one of the Command Posts dedicated to the Turian military elite. As the second-born in his family, Garrus was expected to follow a strict path of discipline and loyalty to the Turian Hierarchy. He became an exceptional marksman, serving in both reconnaissance and special ops units where his skills were instrumental in several critical missions. Known for his tactical acumen and unwavering sense of justice, Garrus earned the respect of his peers, although his independent nature often led to disagreements with superior officers who preferred stricter adherence to protocol. His experience during the Reaper conflicts left him with scars, both physical and emotional. His caseworker has recommended that Garrus continue engaging in community work and mentorship programs, which could help him reconcile his sense of duty with the need for healing after years of conflict.

clients.name: T'Lora Sur

scars: Faint scar on her left palm from an incident during early combat training
tattoos: Vulcan glyph for 'Peace' on her right ankle, a mark she chose after completing Kolinahr training

clients.description: T'Lora Sur was born in the Raal Province of Vulcan, a region known for its beautiful red deserts and philosophical traditions. Raised as the only child in a family of scholars, T'Lora was encouraged from a young age to pursue knowledge and embrace Vulcan values of logic and discipline. Despite her scholarly upbringing, she also developed an interest in self-defense and martial arts, a pursuit that provided her with balance between mental rigor and physical training. T'Lora recently completed the Kolinahr ritual, seeking to purge all emotions in favor of pure logic. Though highly disciplined and calm, her caseworker has noted that T'Lora might benefit from finding a creative outlet to foster a deeper connection with herself and others, suggesting that pure logic can still coexist with forms of personal expression that are valuable to one's well-being.

clients.name: Raegor Zorn

scars: Horizontal scar across his upper right arm from resistance fighting during the Cardassian Occupation
tattoos: Bajoran Resistance insignia on his left shoulder, representing his commitment to the cause

clients.description: Raegor Zorn was born in the Rakantha Province of Bajor, a region heavily affected during the Cardassian Occupation. As the first-born in a family of four children, Raegor took on responsibilities early, particularly during the turbulent years of the Occupation. Growing up amidst political turmoil, he joined the Bajoran Resistance at a young age, playing a role in covert operations to undermine Cardassian control. Known for his resilience and tactical thinking, Raegor became a symbol of hope within his community. Since the liberation, Raegor has transitioned into a community leader, helping rebuild his hometown and serve on the Rakantha regional council. Despite his successes, his caseworker noted that Raegor often struggles to leave behind the traumas of war, and has suggested that he participate in restorative activities, such as meditation and arts, to help process his past and find greater peace.

clients.name: Nyla Vek

scars: Three parallel scars running diagonally across her back from a survival rite on Iridonia
tattoos: Intricate Zabrak tribal tattoos around her forehead, symbolizing resilience and honor

clients.description: Nyla Vek was born in the Ashen Wastes of Iridonia, a harsh environment that forged her resilient spirit. Raised as the middle child of six, Nyla learned to adapt quickly and navigate the complexities of both family dynamics and the unforgiving Iridonian landscape. The Zabrak of Iridonia place great value on endurance, and Nyla excelled in survival training and combat, earning her place within the Ashen Clan. Known for her fierce independence and sense of duty, Nyla chose to serve as a guide and protector, leading expeditions through the Ashen Wastes and helping younger members of the clan navigate survival rites. Despite her strengths, Nyla often struggles to express vulnerability, a trait shaped by her culture’s emphasis on toughness. Her caseworker noted that engaging in community rituals focused on collective storytelling or ceremonial dance could help Nyla connect with her emotions in a culturally meaningful way, allowing her to explore her softer side while still honoring her heritage.

clients.name: Torran M'Kal

scars: Long scar along his left forearm from a strategic battle exercise gone wrong
tattoos: Chiss Ascendancy emblem on his upper left arm, representing his commitment to the Ascendancy

clients.description: Torran M'Kal was born in District 3 of Csilla, the homeworld of the Chiss Ascendancy, into a family that held a position of moderate influence within the Ascendant Nobility. From an early age, Torran was groomed to uphold the interests of the Ascendancy, training in the intricacies of political strategy and military tactics. Known for his keen analytical skills and calm demeanor, Torran rose through the ranks to serve as a tactician for the Ascendancy's Defense Fleet. Despite his aptitude for strategic planning, Torran often finds the rigid social expectations of Chiss society to be stifling, and he harbors a desire to explore more creative and unconventional pursuits. His caseworker has suggested that Torran engage in activities such as writing or composing music, which could allow him to explore new forms of expression while maintaining his disciplined approach.

clients.name: Kylor Drex

scars: Two intersecting scars across his chest from a combat trial during the Nightbrother rites
tattoos: Dathomirian tribal tattoos in black and red covering his head and chest, symbolizing his strength and loyalty to his clan

clients.name: Elsa

scars: None (Heals rapidly through magic)
tattoos: None, but possesses shimmering frost-like patterns that appear on her arms when casting spells

clients.description: Elsa was born in the royal family of Arendelle as the first-born heir to the throne. She possesses powerful ice magic, an ability that manifested at an early age, which caused both wonder and fear in her family. To protect those she loved, Elsa chose to isolate herself, spending many years in her room trying to control her powers. Eventually, through courage, love, and the support of her sister Anna, Elsa learned to embrace her magical gifts, turning them from a source of fear into an asset that brought beauty and harmony to her kingdom. Known for her grace, poise, and fierce protection of her loved ones, Elsa is a symbol of resilience. Despite her abilities, Elsa sometimes struggles with balancing her role as a ruler and her desire for personal freedom. Her caseworker has recommended that Elsa engage in creative and communal activities that would allow her to explore the lighter aspects of her magic, such as hosting winter festivals in Arendelle or organizing snow sculpture workshops. Such activities could help Elsa build closer bonds with her community while enjoying her unique gifts in a lighthearted setting.

clients.name: Peter Parker

scars: Various small scars from past battles, notably a scar on his left shoulder from a fight with the Vulture
tattoos: None

clients.description: Peter Parker was born and raised in Queens, New York City, and after the loss of his parents at a young age, he was raised by his Aunt May and Uncle Ben. Gifted with superhuman abilities after being bitten by a genetically-altered spider, Peter became the masked vigilante known as Spider-Man, using his newfound powers to protect the citizens of New York City. Despite his extraordinary strength, agility, and 'spider-sense,' Peter has always prioritized the values instilled in him by Uncle Ben: 'With great power comes great responsibility.' Balancing his superhero duties with his everyday life has been a constant struggle for Peter, especially as he juggles personal relationships, work responsibilities, and the need to keep his identity secret. Known for his intelligence, sense of humor, and determination, Peter often uses his wit to cope with the stresses of his double life. His caseworker has suggested that Peter engage in activities that help him decompress, such as photography projects focused on New York's landscape or mentoring younger science students, allowing him to use his skills in a relaxed, positive setting that does not involve saving the world.

clients.name: Tony Stark

scars: Circular scar on his chest from the arc reactor implant
tattoos: None

clients.description: Tony Stark was born in Manhattan, New York City, to billionaire industrialist Howard Stark and socialite Maria Stark. As a child prodigy, Tony showed a natural affinity for engineering and technology, eventually taking over Stark Industries after the untimely death of his parents. His life took a dramatic turn when he was captured by terrorists and forced to create weapons, during which he sustained a severe chest injury. Instead of building the weapons, Tony constructed the first Iron Man suit and an arc reactor to keep shrapnel from reaching his heart. From that moment, he decided to use his intellect and resources to protect humanity rather than simply profit from weapons manufacturing. Known for his brilliance, wit, and confidence, Tony is also aware of the ethical responsibilities his inventions bring. Despite his heroic persona, he struggles with anxiety and the weight of responsibility that comes with being Iron Man. His caseworker has suggested that Tony find ways to focus on his personal well-being, such as investing time in humanitarian projects unrelated to technology or mentoring young engineers, which could help him find fulfillment beyond the Iron Man persona and establish a healthier work-life balance.

clients.name: Natasha Romanoff

scars: Several small scars from past missions, including a knife scar on her upper left thigh
tattoos: None

clients.description: Natasha Romanoff, also known as the Black Widow, was born in Stalingrad (now Volgograd), Russia, and became an orphan at a young age. She was recruited into the Red Room, a covert Soviet training program, where she was trained extensively in espionage, martial arts, and weapons handling. The training was intense and left Natasha with a highly developed skillset but also emotional scars from the manipulation and conditioning she endured. Despite her complicated past, Natasha defected and eventually joined S.H.I.E.L.D., becoming one of their most skilled agents. Known for her intelligence, resourcefulness, and ability to adapt to any situation, Natasha has consistently put herself on the front lines to protect her allies. While she is often seen as calm under pressure and fiercely loyal, Natasha still grapples with her past and the 'red in her ledger' that she hopes to make up for through her heroic actions. Her caseworker has suggested engaging in community-focused activities like self-defense workshops for women and youth or art classes focused on storytelling through painting to help Natasha find a positive outlet for her skills and create new, uplifting connections with others.

clients.name: Steve Rogers

scars: Scars from numerous battles, including a notable scar on his left side from shrapnel during WWII
tattoos: None

clients.description: Steve Rogers, also known as Captain America, was born on July 4th, 1923, in Brooklyn, New York. Before becoming Captain America, Steve was a frail young man with a strong sense of justice and an unbreakable will to serve his country. His transformation came through the Super Soldier Serum, which enhanced his physical abilities to superhuman levels, allowing him to serve as a symbol of hope and courage during World War II. After sacrificing himself to save others at the end of the war, Steve was frozen in ice for nearly 70 years before being revived in the modern era. Known for his unwavering morals, leadership qualities, and resilience, Steve has consistently been a pillar of integrity, always putting others before himself. Despite his heroic persona, Steve struggles with adjusting to modern society, often feeling out of place in a world that has changed so much during his absence. His caseworker has suggested that Steve engage in activities that could help him integrate into contemporary society, such as volunteering at veterans' support groups or teaching history courses focusing on the WWII era, providing him with opportunities to connect with others while sharing his unique experiences and insights.

clients.name: Bruce Banner

scars: Minor surgical scars on his arm from medical experiments and tests
tattoos: None

clients.description: Bruce Banner was born in Dayton, Ohio, and from a young age showed an extraordinary aptitude for science, particularly in the field of gamma radiation. His life changed forever when an experimental gamma bomb he was working on exploded, exposing him to a massive dose of gamma radiation. Instead of killing him, the radiation transformed Bruce into the Hulk—an unstoppable, powerful green giant triggered by his anger or extreme stress. This dual identity has defined Bruce's life, with the Hulk embodying his repressed rage and serving both as a protector and a threat. Known for his incredible intelligence and soft-spoken nature, Bruce constantly seeks ways to manage or cure his Hulk side while also trying to use his condition for good. He often struggles with the fear of hurting those around him and grapples with a deep sense of isolation. His caseworker has suggested that Bruce engage in activities that encourage inner peace and community connection, such as yoga, meditation, or leading workshops on gamma research to help him channel his intellect in a way that positively impacts others while also finding moments of personal tranquility.

clients.name: Thor Odinson
clients.language: Allspeak (Asgardian language understood by all beings), English, Old Norse

scars: Several scars from battles across realms, including a scar on his right cheek from the Battle of Vanaheim
tattoos: None

clients.description: Thor Odinson, Prince of Asgard and the God of Thunder, was born in Asgard, the Realm Eternal, to King Odin and Queen Frigga. From an early age, Thor was trained to be a warrior, excelling in combat and leadership. Wielding Mjolnir, the enchanted hammer that can only be lifted by those deemed worthy, Thor's powers include the ability to summon lightning, fly, and possess superhuman strength. Thor's journey has not only been one of battles across realms but also a personal transformation—from a brash, impetuous prince to a more thoughtful and humble leader. Despite his power and status, Thor has faced great losses, including the destruction of Asgard and the deaths of many loved ones, which have deeply affected him. Known for his bravery, loyalty, and sense of honor, Thor often uses humor to cope with the burdens of leadership and loss. His caseworker has suggested that Thor engage in activities that allow him to reconnect with his sense of purpose beyond warfare, such as mentoring young warriors, organizing Asgardian cultural festivals, or leading efforts to rebuild communities both on Earth and across the cosmos, allowing him to focus on creating and nurturing rather than just fighting.

clients.name: Loki Laufeyson
clients.birthPlace: Jotunheim, Realm of the Frost Giants
clients.language: Allspeak (Asgardian language understood by all beings), English, Old Norse
clients.birthOrder: Adopted son of Odin and Frigga

scars: None visible, relies on illusion to cover marks and injuries
tattoos: None

clients.description: Loki Laufeyson was born in Jotunheim, the land of the Frost Giants, as the son of Laufey, the King of the Frost Giants. Found as an infant by Odin after a battle, Loki was brought to Asgard and raised as Odin's son alongside Thor, though he was unaware of his true heritage for much of his early life. From a young age, Loki showed a natural aptitude for magic, mastering the arts of illusion and manipulation. Known as the God of Mischief, Loki's complex relationship with Thor and his struggle for recognition have been central themes in his life. Loki often oscillates between the roles of villain and anti-hero, motivated by a desire for power, recognition, and a sense of belonging. Despite his cunning and self-serving nature, Loki has moments of vulnerability and compassion, particularly towards those he loves. His caseworker has recommended that Loki focus on activities that foster genuine connections and a sense of community, such as teaching magic to young Asgardians or engaging in storytelling circles to share his experiences in a creative, constructive manner. These activities could help Loki channel his talents for transformation and illusion towards building relationships rather than furthering schemes.

clients.name: Wanda Maximoff

scars: Several faint scars from battles against Hydra and Ultron
tattoos: None

clients.description: Wanda Maximoff, also known as the Scarlet Witch, was born in the war-torn nation of Sokovia alongside her twin brother Pietro. Their lives were marked by hardship from an early age, as their family was caught in the crossfire of regional conflicts. Wanda and Pietro were subjected to Hydra experiments, which awakened Wanda's latent mutant abilities, giving her powerful magical and telekinetic powers. After the death of her brother and her alliance with the Avengers, Wanda became a key member of the team, fighting against powerful threats to humanity. Known for her immense power, Wanda is also deeply empathetic, with a strong desire to protect those she loves. However, her emotions are both her greatest strength and her greatest vulnerability, often driving her actions in unpredictable ways. Wanda's journey is one of seeking control over her powers and her emotions, especially following the significant losses she has endured. Her caseworker has suggested that Wanda engage in therapeutic activities that combine her natural gifts with healing practices, such as energy healing workshops or community service focused on helping war refugees. These activities could help Wanda channel her abilities in ways that are constructive and fulfilling, allowing her to find peace and connection in a positive context.

clients.name: T'Challa

scars: Few minor scars from combat, notably a scar on his right bicep from the Battle of Wakanda
tattoos: None, but ceremonial markings are worn during rituals

clients.description: T'Challa, the Black Panther and king of Wakanda, was born in the secluded and technologically advanced nation of Wakanda as the first-born son of King T'Chaka. As the heir to the throne, T'Challa was groomed for leadership, learning the importance of protecting his people and their secrets. Following the death of his father, T'Challa took up the mantle of the Black Panther—a protector of Wakanda—and embraced his role as king. The powers of the Black Panther, granted to him by consuming the Heart-Shaped Herb, gave T'Challa enhanced strength, agility, and senses, allowing him to serve as Wakanda's protector both at home and abroad. Known for his intelligence, diplomatic skills, and honor, T'Challa is a leader who deeply cares for his people and believes in using Wakanda's resources to help the world. Despite his power and responsibilities, T'Challa often struggles with balancing tradition with the need for progress, especially in light of opening Wakanda to the international community. His caseworker has suggested that T'Challa engage in activities that help him connect more personally with the global community, such as leading technology exchange programs or hosting cultural events that share Wakandan heritage with the world, thereby fostering a sense of unity while maintaining his own cultural identity.

clients.name: Stephen Strange

scars: Numerous scars on his hands from the car accident that ended his surgical career
tattoos: None

clients.description: Dr. Stephen Strange was born in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, and grew up aspiring to be one of the world's most renowned neurosurgeons. With his exceptional skill and intelligence, he became a highly successful, yet arrogant, surgeon until a devastating car accident damaged the nerves in his hands, effectively ending his medical career. In a desperate attempt to regain his skills, Strange sought out alternative treatments, leading him to Kamar-Taj in Nepal. There, he learned the mystic arts under the guidance of the Ancient One and transformed from a broken man into the Sorcerer Supreme. Known for his photographic memory, determination, and the mastery of countless mystical spells, Stephen now dedicates his life to protecting Earth from supernatural threats. Despite his strength in magic, Stephen struggles with letting go of his former ego and adapting to a life defined by humility and service. His caseworker has suggested that Stephen engage in activities that further ground him in the present, such as teaching introductory classes on magic for new apprentices at Kamar-Taj or volunteering as a mentor for those struggling with physical disabilities, helping them find new paths in life just as he did.

clients.name: Natasha Romanoff

scars: Small scars from past missions, notably a scar on her upper left thigh from a knife wound
tattoos: None

clients.description: Natasha Romanoff, known by her alias Black Widow, was born in Stalingrad (now Volgograd), Russia. She became an orphan at a young age and was subsequently recruited into the Red Room, a secret Soviet training facility that specialized in the creation of elite spies. There, Natasha underwent rigorous training in combat, espionage, and psychological conditioning, leaving her with unparalleled skills and emotional scars. Though her training made her a highly effective operative, Natasha eventually sought to leave her dark past behind, defecting to join S.H.I.E.L.D. and later becoming an Avenger. Natasha is known for her adaptability, intelligence, and tenacity, often taking on the most dangerous assignments without hesitation. Despite her incredible skills, Natasha still struggles with a sense of guilt over her past actions, particularly the moral compromises she made during her years as an assassin. Her caseworker has suggested that Natasha focus on community-building activities, such as leading self-defense workshops for women or sharing her story to empower others, helping her to channel her skills and experiences into a positive force for change.

clients.name: Carol Danvers

scars: None visible due to Kree-enhanced healing factor
tattoos: None

clients.description: Carol Danvers, also known as Captain Marvel, was born in Boston, Massachusetts. She displayed a fierce determination and sense of justice from a young age, leading her to join the United States Air Force where she excelled as a combat pilot. During a mission involving the experimental energy core of a Kree spaceship, Carol was exposed to Tesseract energy, which altered her DNA, merging it with that of the Kree and endowing her with superhuman abilities, such as flight, super strength, and energy manipulation. Carol’s transformation made her one of the universe's most powerful heroes. Though her powers allow her to protect both Earth and distant galaxies, Carol often struggles with her dual identity and the burden of her immense abilities. Known for her bravery, leadership, and sometimes stubborn streak, Carol often takes on the role of protector without hesitation. Her caseworker has suggested that Carol focus on activities that help her stay grounded, such as mentoring young pilots or working with underrepresented youth interested in aerospace, enabling her to share her passion for flight while building meaningful relationships with those who look up to her.

clients.name: Sam Wilson

scars: Small scar on his left forearm from a parachuting accident during training
tattoos: None

clients.description: Sam Wilson, also known as the Falcon, was born in Harlem, New York City, where he grew up inspired by his community and the values instilled in him by his family. He served in the United States Air Force as a pararescue airman, where he distinguished himself with his bravery and dedication to rescuing others. After leaving the military, Sam became a counselor to veterans, helping them deal with the difficulties of re-integrating into civilian life, which showcased his empathy and desire to give back. Equipped with a special flight suit, Sam eventually became a partner to Captain America and later took up the shield himself, becoming a symbol of hope and resilience. Known for his leadership, courage, and compassion, Sam is always willing to stand up for what is right, using his skills to protect those who cannot protect themselves. Despite his strength, Sam sometimes struggles with the weight of his role as Captain America and the expectations placed upon him. His caseworker has suggested that Sam continue his community outreach by leading programs for at-risk youth, using his experiences to inspire and uplift them, and hosting motivational talks for veterans to share his journey from a soldier to a symbol of hope.

clients.name: Gamora
clients.birthOrder: Orphan (No known biological siblings, adopted siblings under Thanos)

scars: Multiple scars from battles, notably a scar across her right shoulder from a training exercise
tattoos: None

clients.description: Gamora, often known as the 'Deadliest Woman in the Galaxy,' was born on the planet Zen-Whoberi, a peaceful world that was ravaged by the armies of Thanos. After her family and most of her people were killed, Gamora was taken in by Thanos, who raised her as his adopted daughter, training her to be a highly skilled assassin. Under his brutal training, Gamora developed exceptional combat skills, but she also carried a deep resentment towards Thanos for the destruction he caused. Eventually, she defected and sought redemption by joining the Guardians of the Galaxy. Known for her incredible combat prowess, agility, and strategic mind, Gamora has become a fierce protector of the universe and her new family, the Guardians. Despite her strength, she struggles with her past and the guilt of her actions under Thanos' command. Her caseworker has suggested that Gamora focus on activities that nurture her compassionate side, such as helping rehabilitate former child soldiers across different planets or leading self-defense workshops for vulnerable communities, allowing her to transform her skills into tools for empowerment and healing.
